name: Long Haotian
description: Typescript/Javascript Developer
Front-end Developer
language_ability: Able to read English documentations swiftly.
Able to write document in English and communicate normally.

project.title: FastLabel
description: At this project, I maintain **front-end** user interfaces and logic.
I used **Vue** and **Typescript** to create this project.
I used **Canvas API** for base graphics.
I implemented reuseable components using **Decorators**, using **mixins** and **event dispatchers**
I optimized the overall performance by using **LocalStorage Caching**, **Recycler View List** and **multiple-layered canvases**.
project.feature: FastLabel is an interactive labeling platform to boost up speed of labeling for AI.

project.title: DogID Identity Platform
description: At this project, I maintain **front-end** and **back-end** interfaces.
I used **Flask** and **Nuxt.js** to create this project.
I used **WebRTC** for live camera recognition and real-time interaction.
project.feature: DogID Identity Platform enable users to identify his beloved dog, protecting him, and even have fun with him.

project.title: GazeLabel
description: At this project, I maintain **front-end** and **middleware**.
I used **Nuxt.js** and **Express** to create this project.
This demostration has been submitted to ACM Sensys 2018.

project.title: Obsidian
description: At this project, I maintain **front-end** user interfaces.
I used **React** to create administration portal. React provides great performance when there is large amount of users.
I used **Webpack** to bundle all the plugins. I used **Happypack** and **Hot Module Reload** to boost up building speed.
I used **Jest** and **Enzyme** to build front-end tests. It prevents code being changed unexpectedly and makes sure binding is working.
project.feature: Obsidian is a project based on .NET Core. It provide a one-stop authentication service for OAuth2.0 compatible sites.

project.title: Prove
description: I used **Typescript** and **Angular** to build user interface. Angular and RxJS provides good solution to chat, which is asynchonomous.
I used **Electron** to build a client. Electron is popular framework which provide cross platform support.
project.feature: Use prove to create your own encrypted message. Protect yourself with GnuPG.

project.title: Kontent
description: I used **Vue** and **Vuex** to build this project. Using Vue provides fast but simple data binding and updating.
I used **Vuex** to store the state tree. Using Vuex, I can track mutations and actions on data.
project.feature: Kontent is a lightweight content management system. It provides simple display with Markdown.

project.title: FailureTroubleshooting
description: At this project, I maintain **front-end** user interfaces.
I used **JQuery** and **Bootstrap** to build front end interface.
I used **Less** to build modular stylesheet. Using Less make less code and build a more generic interface.
project.feature: FailureTrobleshooting is a project based on ASP.NET and MongoDB. It provides a fully-featured system which can maintain, track and review fixes and troubles.
